chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
K: AbsRing
V: NormedModule K
U: NormedModule K
F: (U -> Prop) -> Prop
FF: Filter F
a: NormedModule.sort K V

Goal:
ex_filterdiff (fun _ : U => a) F

Premises:
Record Filter (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) : Prop := Build_Filter { filter_true : F (fun _ : T => True); filter_and : forall P Q : T -> Prop, F P -> F Q -> F (fun x : T => P x /\ Q x); filter_imp : forall P Q : T -> Prop, (forall x : T, P x -> Q x) -> F P -> F Q } For Filter: Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted For Filter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope] For Build_Filter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _ function_scope function_scope]
AbelianGroup.sort = fun t : AbelianGroup => let (sort, _, _) := t in sort : AbelianGroup -> Type AbelianGroup.sort is a coercion
ex_filterdiff = fun (f : U -> V) (F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) => exists l : U -> V, filterdiff f F l : (U -> V) -> ((U -> Prop) -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope function_scope]
Notation NormedModule := NormedModule.type
ex_filterdiff_ext_loc = fun (F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) (FF : Filter F) (f g : U -> V) (H : F (fun y : U => f y = g y)) (H0 : forall x : U, is_filter_lim F x -> f x = g x) (H1 : ex_filterdiff f F) => match H1 with | @ex_intro _ _ l Hl => ex_intro (fun l0 : U -> V => filterdiff g F l0) l (filterdiff_ext_loc f g l H H0 Hl) end : forall F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop, Filter F -> forall f g : U -> V, F (fun y : U => f y = g y) -> (forall x : U, is_filter_lim F x -> f x = g x) ->...-> ex_filterdiff g F Arguments F, FF are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [function_scope _ function_scope function_scope _ function_scope _]
ex_filterdiff_ext = fun (F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) (FF : Filter F) (f g : U -> V) (H : forall y : U, f y = g y) (H0 : ex_filterdiff f F) => match H0 with | @ex_intro _ _ l Hl => ex_intro (fun l0 : U -> V => filterdiff g F l0) l (filterdiff_ext f g l H Hl) end : forall F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop, Filter F -> forall f g : U -> V, (forall y : U, f y = g y) -> ex_filterdiff f F -> ex_filterdiff g F Arguments F, FF are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [function_scope _ function_scope function_scope function_scope _]
ex_filterdiff_locally = fun (F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) (FF : ProperFilter F) (f : U -> V) (x : U) (Fx : is_filter_lim F x) (H : ex_filterdiff f (locally x)) => match H with | @ex_intro _ _ l Df => ex_intro (fun l0 : U -> V => filterdiff f F l0) l (filterdiff_locally f x l Fx Df) end : forall F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop, ProperFilter F -> forall (f : U -> V) (x : U), is_filter_lim F x -> ex_filterdiff f (locally x) -> ex_filterdiff f F Arguments F, FF are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [function_scope _ function_scope _ _ _]
filterlim_comp_2 : forall (f : ?T -> ?U) (g : ?T -> ?V) (h : ?U -> ?V -> ?W), filterlim f ?F ?G -> filterlim g ?F ?H -> filterlim (fun x : ?U * ?V => h (fst x) (snd x)) (filter_prod ?G ?H) ?I -> filterlim (fun x : ?T => h (f x) (g x)) ?F ?I where ?T : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- Type] ?U : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) ->...-> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- Filter ?F]
filter_and : forall P Q : ?T -> Prop, ?F P -> ?F Q -> ?F (fun x : ?T => P x /\ Q x) where ?T : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- Type] ?F : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?Filter : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- Filter ?F]
filterlim_locally : forall (f : ?T -> ?U) (y : ?U), filterlim f ?F (locally y) < -> (forall eps : posreal, ?F (fun x : ?T => ball y eps (f x))) where ?T : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- Type] ?U : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- UniformSpace] ?F : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- (?T -> Prop) ->...-> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- Filter ?F]
continuous_opp : forall (f : ?U -> ?V) (x : ?U), continuous f x -> continuous (fun x0 : ?U => opp (f x0)) x where ?U : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- UniformSpace] ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- NormedModule ?K]
continuous_scal_r : forall (k : ?K) (f : ?U -> ?V) (x : ?U), continuous f x -> continuous (fun y : ?U => scal k (f y)) x where ?U : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- UniformSpace] ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- NormedModule ?K]
continuous_minus : forall (f g : ?U -> ?V) (x : ?U), continuous f x -> continuous g x -> continuous (fun x0 : ?U => minus (f x0) (g x0)) x where ?U : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- UniformSpace] ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- NormedModule ?K]
continuous_plus : forall (f g : ?U -> ?V) (x : ?U), continuous f x -> continuous g x -> continuous (fun x0 : ?U => plus (f x0) (g x0)) x where ?U : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- UniformSpace] ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- NormedModule ?K]
continuous_comp : forall (f : ?U -> ?V) (g : ?V -> ?W) (x : ?U), continuous f x -> continuous g (f x) -> continuous (fun x0 : ?U => g (f x0)) x where ?U : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- UniformSpace] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- UniformSpace] ?W : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- UniformSpace]
continuous_scal : forall (k : ?U -> ?K) (f : ?U -> ?V) (x : ?U), continuous k x -> continuous f x -> continuous (fun y : ?U => scal (k y) (f y)) x where ?U : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- UniformSpace] ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- NormedModule ?K]
is_domin_le : forall (f : ?T -> ?U) (g : ?T -> ?V), is_domin ?F f g -> filter_le ?G ?F -> is_domin ?G f g where ?T : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- Type] ?Ku : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- AbsRing] ?Kv : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- AbsRing] ?U : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) ->...-> Prop]
filterlim_filter_le_2 : forall f : ?T -> ?U, filter_le ?G ?H -> filterlim f ?F ?G -> filterlim f ?F ?H where ?T : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- Type] ?U : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- Type] ?F : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?G : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- (?U -> Prop) ->...-> Prop]
filterlim_filter_le_1 : forall f : ?T -> ?U, filter_le ?G ?F -> filterlim f ?F ?H -> filterlim f ?G ?H where ?T : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- Type] ?U : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- Type] ?F : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?G : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- (?T -> Prop) ->...-> Prop]
filterdiff_const = fun (F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) (FF : Filter F) (a : V) => conj is_linear_zero (fun (x : U) (_ : is_filter_lim F x) (eps : posreal) => filter_imp (fun _ : U => True) (fun x0 : U => norm (minus (minus a a) zero) <= eps * norm (minus x0 x)) (fun (y : U) (_ : True) => (fun _evar_0_ : norm (plus zero (opp zero)) <= eps * norm (plus y (opp x)) => eq_ind_r (fun _pattern_value_ : V => norm (plus _pattern_value_ (opp zero)) <= eps * norm (plus y (opp x))) _evar_0_ (plus_opp_r a)) ((fun _evar_0_ : norm (opp zero) <= eps * norm (plus y (opp x)) => eq_ind_r (fun _pattern_value_ : V =>...
filter_imp : forall P Q : ?T -> Prop, (forall x : ?T, P x -> Q x) -> ?F P -> ?F Q where ?T : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- Type] ?F : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?Filter : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- Filter ?F]
filterlim_locally_ball_norm = fun (K : AbsRing) (T : Type) (U : NormedModule K) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (FF : Filter F) (f : T -> U) (y : U) => conj (fun (Cf : filterlim f F (locally y)) (eps : posreal) => Cf (fun x : U => ball_norm y eps x) (locally_le_locally_norm y (fun x : U => ball_norm y eps x) (locally_norm_ball_norm y eps))) (fun Cf : forall eps : posreal, F (fun x : T => ball_norm y eps (f x)) => filterlim_filter_le_2 f (locally_norm_le_locally y) (fun (P : U -> Prop) (H : locally_norm y P) => match H with | @ex_intro _ _ eps He => filter_imp (ball_norm y eps) P (fun t : U => He t) (Cf eps)...
eq_close : forall x y : ?V, close x y -> x = y where ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- NormedModule ?K]
norm_eq_zero : forall x : ?V, norm x = 0 -> x = zero where ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- NormedModule ?K]
is_filter_lim_locally_unique : forall x y : ?V, is_filter_lim (locally x) y -> x = y where ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- NormedModule ?K]
norm_ge_0 : forall x : ?V, 0 <= norm x where ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- NormedModule ?K]
locally_le_locally_norm : forall x : ?V, filter_le (locally x) (locally_norm x) where ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- NormedModule ?K]
locally_norm_le_locally : forall x : ?V, filter_le (locally_norm x) (locally x) where ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- NormedModule ?K]
norm_opp : forall x : ?V, norm (opp x) = norm x where ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- NormedModule ?K]
filterdiff_continuous = fun (f : U -> V) (x : U) (H : ex_filterdiff f (locally x)) => filterdiff_continuous_aux f H x (fun (P : U -> Prop) (H0 : locally x P) => H0) : forall (f : U -> V) (x : U), ex_filterdiff f (locally x) -> continuous f x Argument scopes are [function_scope _ _]
ex_filterdiff_ext_locally = fun (f g : U -> V) (x : U) (H : locally x (fun y : U => f y = g y)) (H0 : ex_filterdiff f (locally x)) => match H0 with | @ex_intro _ _ l Hl => ex_intro (fun l0 : U -> V => filterdiff g (locally x) l0) l (filterdiff_ext_locally f g x l H Hl) end : forall (f g : U -> V) (x : U), locally x (fun y : U => f y = g y) -> ex_filterdiff f (locally x) -> ex_filterdiff g (locally x) Argument scopes are [function_scope function_scope _ _ _]
ball_norm_sym : forall (x y : ?V) (eps : posreal), ball_norm x eps y -> ball_norm y eps x where ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- NormedModule ?K]
ball_norm_eq : forall x y : ?V, (forall eps : posreal, ball_norm x eps y) -> x = y where ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- NormedModule ?K]
locally_norm_ball_norm : forall (x : ?V) (eps : posreal), locally_norm x (ball_norm x eps) where ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : V |- NormedModule ?K]
